categories: Category:Battles of the Hunt for Zsinj

nodes.text: In 7 ABY, parts of Wraith Squadron and Rogue Squadron attempted a raid on the Imperial world of Lavisar. During the battle, a New Republic intelligence team detonated a fake bomb when Wraith Squadron approached the world. The Wraiths then purposefully fled from the battle, pursued by planetary defenders. During their escape they were able to wipe out a small lunar garrison launched to intercept them. The Wraiths suffered no casualties, though the defenders lost numerous starfighters.
